landingPage.intro: We think that budgeting is something everyone should do. However, many might see budgeting as a “must-do”-thing that too often gets avoided. I believe that I can help a lot of people in getting started with simple budgeting. Its visual representations will make budgeting more easy and more fun!
landingPage.features.1.description: We run on single page, which dramatically reduces the number of round-trip requests
landingPage.features.2.description: You see what you clicked! Thus, no more page refresh, which is easy to use and learn
landingPage.features.3.description: So far, only English is supported. We are simply that international
